DataElement.preferredName: Prostate Quality of Life Incomplete Urination Problem Past 4 Week Problem Severity Scale
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A numeric value to represent changes in routine tasks of daily living due to interference from symptoms of difficulty to completely excrete urine due to interference from symptoms of prostate cancer.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Prostate Quality of Life Incomplete Urination Problem
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: related to changes in routine tasks of daily living due to interference from symptoms of difficulty to completely excrete urine from the bladder due to interference from symptoms of prostate cancer.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A gland in the male reproductive system just below the bladder. It surrounds part of the urethra, the canal that empties the bladder. It produces a fluid that forms part of semen. (NCI-GLOSS):The subjective measurement of an individual's sense of well-being and ability to enjoy life.  The concept holds varying meanings for different people and may evolve over time. For some individuals it implies autonomy, empowerment, capability, and choice; for others, security, social integration, or freedom from stress or illness.

Concepts.definition: The walnut shaped accessory sex gland of the male reproductive system. It is located in the pelvis just below the bladder, surrounding the prostatic part of the urethra. The prostate gland secretes a fluid which is part of the semen.

The subjective measurement of an individual's sense of well-being and ability to enjoy life. The concept holds varying meanings for different people and may evolve over time. For some individuals it implies autonomy, empowerment, capability, and choice; for others, security, social integration, or freedom from stress or illness.

Property.preferredDefinition: Not whole; lacking some necessary part or detail; unfinished.:the discharge of urine.:Problem; a state of difficulty that needs to be resolved.

Concepts.definition: Not whole; lacking some necessary part or detail; unfinished.
The discharge of urine.
A difficulty, disorder, or condition needing resolution.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: information on quality of patient life and ability to function

RepresentationTerm.preferredName: Past Integer::4 Week Urinary Problem Severity Scale
RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Past; before the present time.:A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.::4:Any period of seven consecutive days.:Having to do with urine or the organs of the body that produce and get rid of urine.:A difficulty, disorder, or condition needing resolution. :Severity; used of the degree of something undesirable e.g. pain or weather.:an ordered reference standard.

Concepts.definition: Before the present time.
A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.
Any period of seven consecutive days.
Urinary; of or relating to urine, of or relating to the urinary system, or of or relating to the function or production or secretion of urine.
A difficulty, disorder, or condition needing resolution.
Used of the degree of something undesirable e.g. pain or weather; also, strictness.
An ordered reference standard used to measure incremental changes.
